statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -2 \\ 0 \\ 1 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -2 \\ 3 \\ -4 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -4 \\ 3 \\ 0 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -8 \\ 6 \\ 0 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 14 \\ -15 \\ 6 \\ 9 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -2 \\ -4 \\ 3 \\ 2 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
